block_comment: This Verilog block assigns a hexadecimal value to `txt_code` based on the value of `cmd_code`. The assignment operation is performed using a chain of ternary (conditional) operators: if `cmd_code` equals 0, `txt_code` gets assigned hexadecimal value `4c4d52`; if `cmd_code` equals 1, `txt_code` gets `415246`, and so forth up to value 7. If `cmd_code` is none of the specified values, `txt_code` defaults to `424144`.
